meanings.definition: Covered in or full of mucus or nasal discharge.
meanings.sent1: The tissue was snottier after I blew my nose.
meanings.sent2: His cold made his nose snottier than usual.
meanings.sent3: The snottier tissue stuck to his hand comically.
meanings.sent4: The pond looked snottier than a swamp after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The baby's face was snottier than a melting ice cream cone.

meanings.definition: Showing disdain or contempt in a rude or arrogant manner.
meanings.sent1: Her snottier attitude towards others made them uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: He became snottier when he didn't get his way.
meanings.sent3: The snottier tone in her voice was unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: His snottier behavior was like a spoiled child.
meanings.sent5: The snottier look on his face said it all.
